insert into t_ebank_extract_result (Id, TaskId, Duration, WebsiteId, BankId, Status, Remark, Url, UniqueSign,UniqueMd5, ResultType, StoragePath, CreatedAt) values (#id#, #taskId#, #duration#, #websiteId#, #bankId#, #status#, #remark#, #url#, #uniqueSign#,#uniqueMd5#, #resultType#, #storagePath#, now())
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
